content: In the ensuing twenty-one years, I’ve never once found myself wishing that my mom spent more time cooking or cleaning. This is so true. A lot of moms get so caught up with household chores that their passion is lost. The same goes for men. Working and being a full-time husband and dad can be quite time consuming. If we can spare atleast 10 minutes every day on something we love doing, life would be so much more fulfilling.
